definition: one time (all the way through)/once through
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time
variant of 遍[bian4]
over and over
over and over

sentences.english: Once again park well away from the area.
sentences.chinese: 再说一遍，把车停得远远的。

sentences.english: I would recite all that had been rehearsed on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 我会把在回家路上练习过的东西背诵一遍。

sentences.english: It wouldn't hurt to read over my notes.
sentences.chinese: 最好能再读一遍我的笔记。

sentences.english: Except they have a tendency to just straight up purchase the technology rather then re-make it.
sentences.chinese: 他们有意图就直截了当的收购技术而非重新制造一遍。
深吸一口气，现在呼出来，再来一遍。

sentences.english: Listen again and follow the instructions next to the pictures.
sentences.chinese: 再听一遍录音，边听边读图画旁的说明。

sentences.english: She snooped through his things for his affairs.
sentences.chinese: 她把他的东西都翻了一遍，想要找他外遇的证据。

sentences.english: An incoming document may well come before each of them in turn.
sentences.chinese: 一份新到的文件可能要依次在每个人那儿都走一遍。

sentences.english: Then I looked again and saw that it was in.
sentences.chinese: 然后我再看了一遍，看到果然是压线。

sentences.english: What is your name ? I missed it because of QRM. Please say again.
sentences.chinese: 由于干扰严重，没听清楚，请重复再说一遍。

sentences.english: The experiments were done most carefully again and again.
sentences.chinese: 这些实验被一遍又一遍潜心致志地做过。

sentences.english: The experiments were done most carefully again and again.
sentences.chinese: 这些实验被一遍又一遍潜心致志地做过。

sentences.english: I asked myself, in an isolated corner of the campus.
sentences.chinese: 我一遍又遍地诘问自己，在校园孤零的一角。

sentences.english: First of all, you don't get to do things over in my line of work.
sentences.chinese: 首先，作为总统，我不能把事情重作一遍。

sentences.english: Conclude each practice period by repeating today's idea to yourself once more.
sentences.chinese: 每次在练习结束时，都记得再复诵一遍当天的观念。

sentences.english: Bob's mother looked over his letter before he mailed it.
sentences.chinese: 巴布的妈妈在他未把信发出前把信看了一遍。

definition: everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time
variant of 遍[bian4]
over and over
careful/attentive/cautious
from start to finish/from head to tail/the whole (thing)
to be finished/to be done for/ruined/gone to the dogs/oh no
to repeat (one's own words or sb else's)/(in the classroom) to paraphrase what one has learned
variant of 複述|复述[fu4 shu4]
variant of 重複|重复[chong2 fu4]
to repeat/to duplicate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to finish/to be over/whole/complete/entire
to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
one by one/in turn
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
variant of 反覆|反复[fan3 fu4]
repeatedly/over and over/to upend/unstable/to come and go/(of an illness) to return
several times
to finish/to complete the task
a moment/a while/in a moment/also pr. [yi1 hui3]
inside and out
